code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Withdraw(_ref){let{userId}=_ref;const[wallet,setWallet]=useState('');const[amount,setAmount]=useState('');const handleWithdraw=async()=>{try{await axios.post(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL}/withdraw`,{userId,wallet,amount});alert('Đã gửi yêu cầu rút');}catch(err){alert('Rút thất bại');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"R\xFAt token v\u1EC1 v\xED Phantom"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"V\xED Phantom",value:wallet,onChange:e=>setWallet(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"S\u1ED1 l\u01B0\u1EE3ng OMX",value:amount,onChange:e=>setAmount(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleWithdraw,children:"R\xFAt"})]});}export default Withdraw;
